  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120630</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120630</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Amperova zanka in  integral poti za konstantno polje</string>
            <string language="en">Amperian loop and path integral for uniform field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amperian Schleife und Pfadintegral für Uniform 
fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Boucle d'Amperian et intégrale de voie d'accès 
pour le champ uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laço de Amperian e integral do trajeto para o 
campo uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo di Amperian ed integrale del percorso per 
il giacimento dell'uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρόχος Amperian και ολοκλήρωμα μονοπατιών για το 
ομοιόμορφο πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bucle de Amperian e integral del camino para el 
campo uniforme</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V konstantnem magnetnem polju imamo žičnati kvadrat.</string>
            <string language="en">Wired square is placed inside constant magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperova zanka</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's loop</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdrahtetes Quadrat ist plaziertes Innere, das 
konstante magnetische auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La place de câble est placée à l'intérieur du
champ magnétique constant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O quadrado wired é colocado dentro do campo 
magnético constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il quadrato metallico è disposto all'interno del
campo magnetico costante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το συνδεμένο με καλώδιο τετράγωνο τοποθετείται μέσα 
στο σταθερό μαγνητικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuadrado atado con alambre se pone dentro de 
campo magnético constante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schleife des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la boucle de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">laço do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ciclo dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βρόχος αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bucle del amperio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del amperio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
